cause.description:
Environment Texas is a statewide, citizen-based environmental advocacy organization. Our professional staff combines independent research, practical ideas and tough-minded advocacy to overcome the opposition of powerful special interests and win real results for Texas' environment. Environment Texas draws on over a decade of success in tackling our state's top environmental problems.
1. Our parks need additional funding to protect our wild places and provide access to outdoor recreation for Texas families
2. We need to significantly reduce the pollution thats causing global warming
3. We need to invest in clean, renewable energy like wind and solar power.
cause.mission: We focus exclusively on protecting Texas' air, water and open spaces. We speak out and take action at the local, state and national levels to improve the quality of our environment and our lives
cause.name: Environment Texas
